committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to quiet title and possession with respect to a certain private land claim in Sumter County, Alabama.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Waives the 160-acre limitation on conveyances under the Color-of-Title Act for any claim for a patent that may be filed under such Act for a specified parcel of land in Sumter County, Alabama.

titles.title: A bill to quiet title and possession with respect to a certain private land claim in Sumter County, Alabama.
